```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(httr)
library(lubridate)
library(magrittr)
```

2019-06-25_sds011_sensor_26953.csv

```{r}

http_error("https://archive.luftdaten.info/2019-06-25/2019-06-25_sds011_sensor_26953.csv")

```

```{r}
sensor_url<-function(required_date,sensor_id){
  paste0("https://archive.luftdaten.info/",
         required_date,
         "/",
         required_date,
         "_sds011_sensor_",
         sensor_id,
         ".csv")
}
```

```{r}
sensor_url("2019-06-25",26953) %>%
  http_error()
```


```{r}

sensor_of_choice<-26953

files<-tibble(day=seq(ymd('2019-06-26'),today(),by='days'))

files %<>%
  mutate(url=sensor_url(day,sensor_of_choice))

files %<>%
  mutate(http_error(url))


```
